function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent RT-qPCR assay results and detection methods","Impact":"Inconsistent results may lead to incorrect conclusions about the presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater, impacting public health decisions.","Mitigation":"Standardization of RT-qPCR assay protocols and detection methods, validation of concentration methods.","Technologies":"Standardized RT-qPCR assay protocols, validated concentration methods.","People":"Public health officials, researchers, wastewater treatment plant operators.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, wastewater treatment plant operators."},{"Description":"RT-qPCR positive samples below quantification level","Impact":"Failure to accurately quantify the presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater, potentially leading to underestimation of virus prevalence.","Mitigation":"Validation of quantification methods, re-evaluation of sample dilution processes.","Technologies":"Validated quantification methods, accurate sample dilution processes.","People":"Public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples","Impact":"The presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater indicates potential community spread of COVID-19, requiring public health interventions and monitoring.","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health interventions, increased monitoring of wastewater for early detection.","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance systems, public health interventions.","People":"Community members, public health officials.","Owner":"Public health organizations, local government."}]}
